languages.text: "Сами Астартес нуждаются в малом. Келья да стол, на котором я могу провести ритуал очищения оружия — вот и все, что необходимо. А вот держать доспех, дарованный Всеотцом, в какой-нибудь худой каморке было бы святотатством. Эта зала под стать для церемонии облачения – под богатым убранством и позолотой кроется добротная пласталь. Славно, я доволен".

"An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."
languages.original_text: "Сами Астартес нуждаются в малом. Келья да стол, на котором я могу провести ритуал очищения оружия — вот и все, что необходимо. А вот держать доспех, дарованный Всеотцом, в какой-нибудь худой каморке было бы святотатством. Эта зала под стать для церемонии облачения – под богатым убранством и позолотой кроется добротная пласталь. Славно, я доволен".

languages.text: “阿斯塔特修士并不需要什么，只要一个小小的房间和一张桌子，可以让我举行武器净化仪式，就完全足够了。不过，如果把全父赐予我的盔甲放在如此寒酸的小破屋里，那就简直是对它的亵渎了。这个房间很不错，很适合举行授甲仪式。房间里华丽的装饰与点缀之下，都是相当坚固的塑钢船板。没错，我很满意。”
languages.original_text: "An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."

traits.locale_text: “阿斯塔特修士并不需要什么，只要一个小小的房间和一张桌子，可以让我举行武器净化仪式，就完全足够了。不过，如果把全父赐予我的盔甲放在如此寒酸的小破屋里，那就简直是对它的亵渎了。这个房间很不错，很适合举行授甲仪式。房间里华丽的装饰与点缀之下，都是相当坚固的塑钢船板。没错，我很满意。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「アスタルテスには必要なものはあまりない。独房と武器に浄化の儀式を施すためのテーブルがあれば十分だ。しかし、全知の父から授かったアーマーを狭い部屋にしまっておくのは冒涜的だ。この部屋なら誓いの儀式に相応しい。豪華な装飾と金箔の下に良いプラスチールがある…これなら満足だ」
languages.original_text: "An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."

traits.locale_text: 「アスタルテスには必要なものはあまりない。独房と武器に浄化の儀式を施すためのテーブルがあれば十分だ。しかし、全知の父から授かったアーマーを狭い部屋にしまっておくのは冒涜的だ。この部屋なら誓いの儀式に相応しい。豪華な装飾と金箔の下に良いプラスチールがある…これなら満足だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Los Astartes no necesitamos gran cosa. Una celda y una mesa en la que celebrar el rito de purificación de mi arma es todo cuanto requiero, pero guardar la armadura que me ha concedido el Padre de todas las cosas en un cubículo cochambroso sería un sacrilegio. Esta cámara servirá para la ceremonia de vestidura. Hay buen plastiacero bajo las decoraciones y el oro. Sí, estoy satisfecho».
languages.original_text: "An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."

traits.locale_text: «Los Astartes no necesitamos gran cosa. Una celda y una mesa en la que celebrar el rito de purificación de mi arma es todo cuanto requiero, pero guardar la armadura que me ha concedido el Padre de todas las cosas en un cubículo cochambroso sería un sacrilegio. Esta cámara servirá para la ceremonia de vestidura. Hay buen plastiacero bajo las decoraciones y el oro. Sí, estoy satisfecho».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Un Astartes se contente de peu. Tout ce dont j'ai besoin, c'est d'une cellule et d'une table pour effectuer le rite de purification sur mon arme. Cela dit, ce serait un sacrilège de ranger l'armure que m'a conférée le Père de Tous dans un vulgaire placard. Cette salle conviendra à la cérémonie de harnachement ; il y a du plastacier de qualité sous les décorations et les dorures. Oui, je suis satisfait. »
languages.original_text: "An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."

traits.locale_text: « Un Astartes se contente de peu. Tout ce dont j'ai besoin, c'est d'une cellule et d'une table pour effectuer le rite de purification sur mon arme. Cela dit, ce serait un sacrilège de ranger l'armure que m'a conférée le Père de Tous dans un vulgaire placard. Cette salle conviendra à la cérémonie de harnachement ; il y a du plastacier de qualité sous les décorations et les dorures. Oui, je suis satisfait. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ein Astartes benötigt nur sehr wenig. Eine Zelle und einen Tisch für mein Waffenreinigungsritual, das ist alles, was ich brauche. Aber die Rüstung, die der Allvater mir geschenkt hat, in einem jämmerlichen Kabuff aufzubewahren, wäre ein Sakrileg. Diese Kammer ist für die Übertragungszeremonie gut geeignet — unter den prunkvollen Dekorationen und dem Gold liegt guter Plaststahl. Ja, ich bin zufrieden."
languages.original_text: "An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Astartes benötigt nur sehr wenig. Eine Zelle und einen Tisch für mein Waffenreinigungsritual, das ist alles, was ich brauche. Aber die Rüstung, die der Allvater mir geschenkt hat, in einem jämmerlichen Kabuff aufzubewahren, wäre ein Sakrileg. Diese Kammer ist für die Übertragungszeremonie gut geeignet — unter den prunkvollen Dekorationen und dem Gold liegt guter Plaststahl. Ja, ich bin zufrieden."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Astartes, fazlasına ihtiyaç duymaz. Bir hücre ve silahımı arındırma ayini gerçekleştirebileceğim bir masa bana yeter. Öte yandan Yücebaba'nın bana bahşettiği zırhı, yıkık dökük bir kabinde tutmak da kutsala hürmetsizlik olur. Bu oda, kuşanma törenine gayet uygun. Zengin süslemelerin ve altın kaplamanın altında kaliteli plasçelik var. Evet, memnunum."
languages.original_text: "An Astartes needs very little. A cell and a table where I can perform the purifying rite on my weapon — that is all I require. But to keep the armour bestowed upon me by the Allfather in some shabby cubicle would be sacrilege. This chamber will do well for the vesting ceremony — there is good plasteel beneath the rich decoration and gilding. Yes, I am satisfied."

traits.locale_text: "Astartes fazlasına ihtiyaç duymaz. Bir hücre ve silahımda arındırma ayini gerçekleştirebileceğim bir masa bana yeter. Ancak Yücebaba'nın bana bahşettiği zırhı, yıkık dökük bir kabinde tutmak saygısızlık olur. Bu oda, kuşanma töreni için gayet uygun. Zengin dekorasyon ve altın kaplamanın altında kaliteli plasçelik var. Evet, memnunum."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
